summary: Motivated Backend Engineer with 4+ years of experience building scalable SaaS solutions in cloud environments. Adept at leveraging AWS services (API Gateway, Lambda, S3) and Python-based data manipulations (pandas) to deliver robust, data-driven architectures. A rapid learner and problem solver (Top 2.5% on LeetCode) who loves startup culture, thrives on ownership, and seeks to transform ideas into impactful, production-ready solutions.

details: üèÖ GPA: 3.79, Top 4% of class.
Combined expertise in algorithms (graphs, Dijkstra‚Äôs) with Python, Go, and C++ to craft high-performance software solutions.
Reached Top 2.5% on LeetCode and Codeforces by solving 1,000+ algorithmic challenges, demonstrating exceptional problem-solving and teamwork.
Constructed serverless microservices in AWS using Python (Flask) and Lambda, streamlining the platform‚Äôs ability to process high-volume data inputs and accelerating feature delivery by 30%.
Devised automated data pipelines leveraging S3 and DynamoDB for resilient storage and real-time data manipulation, leveraging pandas for rapid insight extraction.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate cutting-edge AI/ML libraries, focusing on data cleanliness, security, and scalable deployment via CI/CD (GitHub Actions).

items.role: Africa to Silicon Valley (A2SV) | Full-Stack Engineer & Head of Education
details: Led the backend strategy for multiple SaaS platforms, incorporating AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB) and GCP for secure, containerized deployments, emphasizing multi-tenant microservices.
Pioneered data-driven features for RateEat, employing Python and Node.js with pandas, ensuring real-time analysis of customer behavior and feedback loops that boosted user retention by 15%.
Mentored 50+ students in competitive programming, fostering a collaborative learning environment and driving knowledge exchange on data architecture, security, and software best practices.
Developed and containerized RESTful APIs with Flask, Python, Docker, and Kubernetes, prioritizing modular and secure data flows.
Introduced systematic QA processes (Selenium, Jest, Cypress), reducing critical bugs by 40% and elevating overall software quality.
Architected backend services using Go on AWS with emphasis on performance, scalability, and secure financial transactions.
Integrated custom APIs with Python-based data transformations to ensure accurate and efficient mobile payment processes.
Implemented a user-centric platform in React for streamlined restaurant rating and reviews.
Leveraged real-time analytics in Python and AWS to measure usage patterns, supporting data-backed marketing insights.
Programming Languages: Python, Go, JavaScript, TypeScript, C/C++, Bash/Shell scripting, Scala
Data & Analytics: Python data manipulation (pandas), Data modeling, ETL pipelines
Cloud & DevOps: AWS (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, API Gateway, EC2, ECS, EKS), Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Jenkins
Backend & Web: Flask, FastAPI, Node.js, Express.js, RESTful APIs, GraphQL
Frontend Frameworks: React, Next.js, Redux, Vue.js, Svelte
Achieved Top 2.5% globally in LeetCode challenges, demonstrating a data-driven, problem-solving mindset.
Won $1000 in A2SV Month-Long Coding Competition, emphasizing scalable solutions and exceptional teamwork.
